data.eml:eml: A new species of Catocala Schrank, 1802 (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae) from Primorsky Krai, Russia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borth, Hugo L. Kons Jr. Robert J., Saldaitis, Aidas (2016): A new species of Catocala Schrank, 1802 (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae) from Primorsky Krai, Russia. Zootaxa 4105 (4): 389-399, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4105.4.7
